nodes.text: The Overbridge, also known as the war room, was the bridge and main command center of the DS-1 Death Star Mobile Battle Station, the Galactic Empire's first moon-sized battle station. It notably housed duty posts for Death Star Troopers and a large pentagonal viewscreen that displayed the status of the Death Star superlaser, as well as designated posts for Grand Moff Wilhuff Tarkin amongst other Imperial officers' and a HoloNet booth for communicating with the Emperor. A conference room was located beside it.
